Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier sick customer at Garfield. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier sick customer at Garfield. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Midway and Western
ShortDescription: Orange Line service has been temporarily suspended between Western and Midway due to unauthorized person on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line service has been temporarily suspended between Western and Midway due to unauthorized person on the tracks.

As a result, trains are operating only between Midway and Western at this time.

 Shuttle buses have been requested between Midway and Western to provide connecting service.

 At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Consider the #62 Archer bus as an Alternative.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
